price: [Ба ӯ мегӯем] «Номаатро бихон. Кофӣ аст, ки имрӯз худ ҳисобгари хеш бошӣ»
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
